articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: Intel says it’s rolling out laptop GPU drivers with 10% to 25% better performance - Ars Technica
articles.description: Laptops with Core Ultra 200V chips CPUs Arc 130V or 140V GPUs should benefit.

articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.title: Google’s NotebookLM expands its AI podcast feature to more languages - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google's AI-based note-taking and research assistant NotebookLM is making its Audio Overviews feature available in 76 new languages, the company announced
articles.content: Google’s AI-based note-taking and research assistant NotebookLM is making its Audio Overviews feature available in 76 new languages, the company announced on Tuesday. Audio Overviews launched last ye… [+2054 chars]
